channel.title: led on MQTTIotStuff
channel.description: Recent content in led on MQTTIotStuff

item.title: Internal Ledbox prototype pictures, revealed
item.description: It’s been a while the ledbox is working, and really gives usefull calm informations each day. As a new design is currently on progress, here are some revealed details about the building.

item.title: LedBox language animation building blocks
item.description: In this more practical followup article, we’ll focus on the led language implementation using python. Led box permit to display some led animation using an individually controlled led strip using ws2812 chip. Hightly configurable animations implementation is shown and presented here, using python generators functions. This article, aims to explain the benefits of such approach in creating the grammar for smart led animations and smart feedback for such devices.
